it.polito.dp2.WF

Class WorkflowMonitorFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.dp2.WF.WorkflowMonitorFactory

  • public abstract class WorkflowMonitorFactory
extends Object
    Defines a factory API that enables applications to obtain one or more objects implementing the WorkflowMonitor interface.

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static WorkflowMonitorFactory newInstance()
                                          throws FactoryConfigurationError
        Obtain a new instance of a WorkflowMonitorFactory.

        This static method creates a new factory instance. This method uses the it.polito.dp2.WF.WorkflowMonitorFactory system property to determine the WorkflowMonitorFactory implementation class to load.

        Once an application has obtained a reference to a WorkflowMonitorFactory it can use the factory to obtain a new WorkflowMonitor instance.

        Returns:
        a new instance of a WorkflowMonitorFactory.
        Throws:
        FactoryConfigurationError - if the implementation is not available or cannot be instantiated.

      • newWorkflowMonitor

        public abstract WorkflowMonitor newWorkflowMonitor()
                                            throws WorkflowMonitorException
        Creates a new instance of a WorkflowMonitor implementation.
        Returns:
        a new instance of a WorkflowMonitor implementation.
        Throws:
        WorkflowMonitorException - if an implementation of WorkflowMonitor cannot be created.
